entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nelson 5:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with snow overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow in the morning. Snow over higher terrain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then clearing. Flurries over higher terrain in the evening and after midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 1000 metres in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
